title: A true copy of part of that paper which Mr. Ashton left in a friend's hands together with the letter in which he sent it enclosed.
author: Ashton, John, d. 1691.
notes: Imperfect: pages creased, stained, and torn with loss of print.
Letter in which the "paper" came enclosed reads: "Newgate, January 27, 1690/91".
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
